channel.title: Do you like ROCK? Not metal.. not heavy rock... but Rock!
channel.description:
If you like rock, try this station.
96.5, Manchester, NH's: TheMill
http://webclust1.liquidcompass.cc/sos4stnrd/audio_player.php?id=WMLL
:D

item.source: Do you like ROCK? Not metal.. not heavy rock... but Rock!

item.title: Do you like ROCK? Not metal.. not heavy rock... but Rock!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:31, topic:43461”]Classic rock rules!!!

Lynyrd Skynyrd is most definitely my favorite band!!![/quote]
Classic rock/Country are my favourite. Actually, I probably like rock more. I wouldn never go out and buy a country album, just use torrents for that. Hoever, whenever I want a greatest Hits album from someone like Johnny Cash, I will go out and buy it.

I’ll post some of the random bands from my iTunes library(Shuffle Mode):
-Def Leppard
-Rush
-The Guess Who
-Bryan Adams
-Billy Idol
-Three Dog Knight
-Pink Floyd
-Guns N’ Roses
-Bon Jovi

I skipped the country bands, besides the country, this kind of music is all I have in my library. Also, I have over 1000 songs, so its not like there all one hit wonders. If anyone needs any good music, I can give you a list of good songs that most people don’t know about, although some of them are by famous bands. I have tons more of other good rock bands as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you like ROCK? Not metal.. not heavy rock... but Rock!
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

I like rock, i saw Bullet for my valentine last night at the apollo in manchester, it had 2 support bans, Gallows (They were ok until the singer got down with the crowd and called a guy twice the size of him a p**sy for not fighting with him, he only said that when he was back on stage and when the guy called him a wan*er he said "come on lets fight, but you have to get through these guys first. (the security guards)), And there was also As they lay dying they were pretty good but as soon as bullet came on, everyone was cheering “Bullet bullet” and when they actually came on everyone screamed very load fireworks went off and they sung a few songs, including Tears dont fall at the end.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you like ROCK? Not metal.. not heavy rock... but Rock!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:22, topic:43461”][quote author=lothy link=topic=60474.msg733556#msg733556 date=1167930898]
I like a bit of ACDC… that probably counts as classic rock.
[/quote]

It is classic rock. Any rock, without heavy death metal or light metal music songs, from the late 50s to the mid 80s is considered classic rock to me.[/quote]
Yeah, well that’s the only rock music I listen to. More or less because they’re also Australian, and I like to support Australian music etc, being the Australian I am.

Read full topic
